page.title: 04St Mary's C.P. School
page.content: In the school we went round the classes, asking what everybody's favourite subjects were between four lessons: Maths, English, Art and Topic. subject class A B C D E F G Maths 11 12 3 1 7 1 0 English 8 7 2 1 2 0 0 Art 11 11 25 19 17 8 31 Topic 4 3 1 13 5 25 3 No. in class 34 33 31 34 31 34 34 This shows that the favourite subject in the school is Art, followed by Topic. Reading plays is an important part in our work. During school hours we work 4 hrs 25 mins and play for 2 hrs. We finish school at 3.40pm.
